title: List of all Androidgoogle play   libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Androidgoogle play   libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: Android-ReactiveLocation
repoList.description: Small library that wraps Google Play Service API in brilliant RxJava Observables reducing boilerplate to minimum.

repoList.name: android-advancedrecyclerview
repoList.description: RecyclerView extension library which provides advanced features. (ex. Google's Inbox app like swiping, Play Music app like drag and drop sorting)

repoList.name: light-novel-library_Wenku8_Android
repoList.description: [CASUALLY MAINTAINED] 轻小说文库 (Wenku8.com) 安卓版第三方公益App，始于2014年的Material Design风格、无广告、不盈利、Google Play上安装包最小的轻小说阅读器(light novel reader)。

repoList.name: smart-app-rate
repoList.description: An Android library that encourages users to rate the app on the Google Play.

repoList.name: donations
repoList.description: Donations library for Android. Supports Google Play Store, Flattr, PayPal, and Bitcoin

repoList.name: Android-InAppBilling
repoList.description: A sample which uses Google's Play Billing Library and it does InApp Purchases and Subscriptions.

repoList.name: ScreenshotsNanny
repoList.description: Android library helps take screenshots for publishing on Google Play Store.

repoList.name: Qigsaw
repoList.description: 🔥🔥Qigsaw ['tʃɪɡsɔ] is a dynamic modularization library which is based on Android App Bundles(Do not need Google Play Service). It supports dynamic delivery for split APKs without reinstalling the base one.

repoList.name: Cards-UI
repoList.description: A library that allows you to easily mimic Google Play's card layout on Android.

repoList.name: PiracyChecker
repoList.description: An Android library that prevents your app from being pirated / cracked using Google Play Licensing (LVL), APK signature protection and more. API 14+ required.

repoList.name: Android-ReactiveLocation
repoList.description: Small library that wraps Google Play Service API in brilliant RxJava Observables reducing boilerplate to minimum.

repoList.name: android-advancedrecyclerview
repoList.description: RecyclerView extension library which provides advanced features. (ex. Google's Inbox app like swiping, Play Music app like drag and drop sorting)
